info.description: IN-CORE Hazard Service For Earthquake, Tornado, Tsunami, Hurricane and Flood
info.title: Hazard Service

get.summary: Returns all earthquakes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of results to return.

post.summary: Creates a new earthquake, the newly created earthquake is returned.
post.description: Additionally, a GeoTiff (raster) is created by default and publish to data repository. User can create both model earthquakes (with attenuation) and dataset-based earthquakes with GeoTiff files uploaded.

get.summary: Returns the earthquake with matching id.

delete.description: Also deletes attached dataset and related files

get.summary: Returns SeismicHazardResults for a given attenuation model-based earthquake id, demand type and unit, coordinates and grid spacing.
get.description: SeismicHazardResults contains the metadata about the raster data along with a list of HazardResults. Each HazardResult is a lat, long and hazard value.

parameters.name: demandType
parameters.description: Ground motion demand type. Ex: PGA, PGV, 0.2 SA, etc

parameters.name: demandUnits
parameters.description: Ground motion demand unit. Ex: g, %g, cm/s, etc

parameters.name: minX
parameters.description: Bounding box of a raster. Min X.

parameters.name: minY
parameters.description: Bounding box of a raster. Min Y.

parameters.name: maxX
parameters.description: Bounding box of a raster. Max X.

parameters.name: maxY
parameters.description: Bounding box of a raster. max Y.

get.summary: Returns hazard values for the given earthquake id.
get.description: The results contain ground shaking parameter (PGA, SA, etc) for specific locations.

parameters.name: demandType
parameters.description: Ground motion demand type. Ex: PGA, PGV, 0.2 SA, etc.

parameters.name: demandUnits
parameters.description: Ground motion demand unit. Ex: g, %g, cm/s, etc.

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: List of points provided as lat,long. Ex: '28.01,-83.85'.

post.summary: Returns earthquake values for a set of locations
post.description: Outputs hazard values, demand types, unit and location.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Json of the points along with demand types and units

parameters.name: siteClassId
parameters.description: Site class dataset from data service.

get.summary: Returns aleatory uncertainties for a model based earthquake
Returns total and epistemic variance for a model based earthquake

parameters.name: variance-type
parameters.description: Type of Variance. epistemic or total

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: List of points provided as lat,long. Ex: '28.01,-83.85'.

get.summary: Returns liquefaction (PGD) values, probability of liquefaction, and probability of ground failure.
get.description: This needs a valid susceptibility dataset as a shapefile for the earthquake location.

parameters.name: demandUnits
parameters.description: Liquefaction demand unit. Ex: in, cm, etc

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: List of points provided as lat,long. Ex: '28.01,-83.85'

post.summary: Returns liquefaction (PGD) values, probability of liquefaction, and probability of ground failure
post.description: This needs a valid susceptibility dataset as a shapefile for a set of earthquake locations.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Json of the points along with demand types(pgd) and units

parameters.name: siteClassId
parameters.description: Site class dataset from data service.

get.summary: Returns earthquake site hazard amplification.
get.description: This returns the amplified hazard given a methodology (e.g. NEHRP), soil map dataset id (optional), latitude, longitude, ground shaking parameter (PGA, Sa, etc), hazard value, and default site class to use.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: ID of site class dataset from data service.

parameters.name: demandType
parameters.description: Ground motion demand type. Ex: PGA, PGV, 0.2 SA, etc.

parameters.name: defaultSiteClass
parameters.description: Default site classification. Expected  A, B, C, D, E or F.

get.summary: Search for a text in all earthquakes
get.description: Gets all earthquakes that contain a specific text

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of results to return

404.description: No earthquakes found with the searched text

get.summary: Returns all floods.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

post.summary: Creates a new flood, the newly created flood is returned.
post.description: Additionally, a GeoTiff (raster) is created by default and publish to data repository. User can create dataset-based floods only.

get.summary: Returns the flood with matching id.

parameters.name: flood-id
parameters.description: Flood dataset guid from data service.

delete.description: Also deletes attached datasets and related files

post.summary: Returns flood values for a set of locations
post.description: Outputs hazard values, demand types, unit and location.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Json of the points along with demand types and units

get.summary: Search for a text in all floods
get.description: Gets all floods that contain a specific text

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

404.description: No floods found with the searched text

get.summary: Returns all hurricanes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

post.summary: Creates a new hurricane, the newly created hurricane is returned.
post.description: Additionally, a GeoTiff (raster) is created by default and publish to data repository. User can create dataset-based hurricanes only.

get.summary: Returns the hurricane with matching id.

parameters.name: hurricane-id
parameters.description: Hurricane dataset guid from data service.

delete.description: Also deletes attached datasets and related files

post.summary: Returns hurricane values for a set of locations
post.description: Outputs hazard values, demand types, unit and location.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Json of the points along with demand types and units

get.summary: Search for a text in all hurricanes
get.description: Gets all hurricanes that contain a specific text

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

404.description: No hurricanes found with the searched text

get.summary: Returns all hurricanes.

parameters.name: coast
parameters.description: Hurricane coast. Ex: 'gulf, florida or east'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

post.summary: Creates a new hurricane, simulation of hurricane windfields is returned.
post.description: One dataset for each time frame of the simulation is returned representing the hurricane windfield's raster. Each cell represents the windspeed at 10m elevation and 3-sec wind gust by default

get.summary: Returns the hurricane with matching id.

parameters.name: hurricaneId
parameters.description: Hurricane dataset guid from data service.

delete.description: Also deletes attached datasets and related files

post.summary: Returns hurricane wind field values for a set of locations
post.description: Outputs hazard values, demand types, unit and location.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Json of the points along with demand types and units

parameters.name: elevation
parameters.description: Elevation in meters at which wind speed has to be calculated.

parameters.name: roughness
parameters.description: Terrain exposure or roughness length. Acceptable range is 0.003 to 2.5

get.summary: Search for a text in all hurricanes
get.description: Gets all hurricanes that contain a specific text

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

404.description: No hurricanes found with the searched text

get.summary: Returns all tornadoes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

post.summary: Creates a new tornado, the newly created tornado is returned.
post.description: Additionally, a GeoTiff (raster) is created by default and publish to data repository. User can create both model tornadoes and dataset-based tornadoes with GeoTiff files uploaded.

get.summary: Returns the tornado with matching id.

parameters.name: tornado-id
parameters.description: Tornado dataset guid from data service.

delete.description: Also deletes attached dataset and related files

get.summary: Returns the wind speed at given location using the specified tornado.

parameters.name: tornado-id
parameters.description: Tornado dataset guid from data service.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed value for random values. Ex: 1000

post.summary: Returns tornado values for a set of locations
post.description: Outputs hazard values, demand types, unit and location.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Json of the points along with demand types and units

parameters.name: simulation
parameters.description: Simulated wind hazard index. Ex: 0 for first, 1 for second and so on

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed value for random values. Ex: 1000

get.summary: Returns a zip shapefile representing tornado defined by given id.

parameters.name: tornado-id
parameters.description: Tornado dataset guid from data service.

get.summary: Search for a text in all tornadoes
get.description: Gets all tornadoes that contain a specific text

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

404.description: No tornadoes found with the searched text

get.summary: Returns all tsunamis.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

post.summary: Creates a new tsunami, the newly created tsunami is returned.
post.description: Additionally, a GeoTiff (raster) is created by default and publish to data repository. User can create dataset-based tsunamis only.

get.summary: Returns the scenario tsunami matching the given id.

parameters.name: tsunami-id
parameters.description: Tsunami dataset guid from data service.

delete.description: Also deletes attached dataset and related files

post.summary: Returns tsunami values for a set of locations
post.description: Outputs hazard values, demand types, unit and location.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Json of the points along with demand types and units

get.summary: Search for a text in all tsunamis
get.description: Gets all tsunamis that contain a specific text

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit no of results to return

404.description: No tsunamis found with the searched text

get.summary: Gives the status of the service.
get.description: This will provide the status of the service as a JSON.

get.summary: Gives the count for each hazard.

allOf.description: Contains id, description, name, privileges and the hazard datasets
